definition: knife/blade/single-edged sword/cutlass/CL:把[ba3]/(slang) dollar (loanword)/classifier for sets of one hundred sheets (of paper)/classifier for knife cuts or stabs

sentences.chinese: 只是这一次拿着一把剃刀。

sentences.english: We bought him a safety razor for his birthday.
sentences.chinese: 送他一把安全剃刀作为生日礼物。

sentences.english: She took a razor and shaved between my eyebrows and even shaped them.
sentences.chinese: 她还拿剃刀剃掉我眉毛的中间，甚至修出眉形。

sentences.english: Cut with razor knife and snap.
The principle of "Occam Razor " was proposed by the philosopher of scholasticism in the middle ages.
sentences.chinese: “奥康姆剃刀”，由中世纪经院哲学家奥康姆提出。

sentences.english: I don't mind lending him my razor, but I draw the line at lending him my tooth-brush.
sentences.chinese: 我不在乎借我的剃刀给他，但是牙刷就不行了。

sentences.english: For the closest shave, use a clean, sharp razor.
sentences.chinese: 要是剃近身处，就用干净锋利的剃刀。

sentences.english: He bought a device for sharpening old razor blades.
sentences.chinese: 他买了一个磨旧剃刀片的器具。

sentences.english: The only thing he necessarily stands by is the razor .
sentences.chinese: 他唯一需要卫护的是他的剃刀。

sentences.english: Razor museum wad opened within the Seki Plant.
sentences.chinese: 剃刀博物馆瓦德在开幕关厂。

sentences.english: He’d anaesthetized himself with chloroform and slashed open his thigh with a razor.
sentences.chinese: 他用氯仿麻醉了自己，并用剃刀割破了大腿。

sentences.english: You must use a sharp razor to shave this area.
sentences.chinese: 你必须用剃刀剃着这一地区。

sentences.english: The razor slipped and cut my cheek.
sentences.chinese: 剃刀一滑把我脸给割破了。

sentences.english: The slave safely saved the sharp shaves in a cave nearby the cafeteria .
sentences.chinese: 奴隶将锋利的剃刀安全地保存在自助餐厅附近的洞里。

sentences.english: He razor-cuts his face clean of beard every day.
sentences.chinese: 他每天用剃刀把脸上的胡子刮干净。
